name: Engage New Media
description: Engage New Media is a one stop creative design agency, offering a full range of services in print and new media, logo design and corporate ID, branding, website design, literature design and pretty much everything in between. Based in the Northwest of England we provide an innovative vision to design that suits your target demographic. Our principles are firmly grounded in the belief that really great design is functional, effective, and delivers results for our clients.
